Package com.gsm.service

Interface OrderBOMService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OrderBOMServiceImpl
    public interface OrderBOMService
    Defines the contract for business operations related to the Order BOM.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.List<OrderBOMDto> findAll()  
      OrderBOMDto findOrCreateBySaleOrderId​(java.lang.Long saleOrderId)
      Finds an existing Order BOM by its associated Sale Order ID.
      OrderBOMDto generatePreviewFromTemplate​(java.lang.Long saleOrderId, java.lang.Long bomTemplateId)
      Generates a preview of what the Order BOM details would look like if based on a specific BOM Template.
      OrderBOMDto save​(OrderBOMDto dto)
      Saves an Order BOM (either creates a new one or updates an existing one), including its details.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> saveAndGeneratePOs​(OrderBOMDto bomDtoFromForm)
      Saves the Order BOM and then automatically generates Purchase Orders (POs) based on the calculated purchase quantities for items not already included in a PO.

    • Method Detail

      • findAll

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
java.util.List<OrderBOMDto> findAll()

      • findOrCreateBySaleOrderId

        OrderBOMDto findOrCreateBySaleOrderId​(java.lang.Long saleOrderId)
        Finds an existing Order BOM by its associated Sale Order ID. If no BOM exists for the given Sale Order, it creates a new, empty OrderBOMDto shell.
        Parameters:
        saleOrderId - The ID of the Sale Order.
        Returns:
        An existing OrderBOMDto (including details) or a new, empty OrderBOMDto linked to the Sale Order.
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - if the Sale Order with the given ID does not exist when creating a new BOM.

      • generatePreviewFromTemplate

        OrderBOMDto generatePreviewFromTemplate​(java.lang.Long saleOrderId,
                                        java.lang.Long bomTemplateId)
        Generates a preview of what the Order BOM details would look like if based on a specific BOM Template. This is used to populate the form when a user selects a template, before saving.
        Parameters:
        saleOrderId - The ID of the target Sale Order (used for calculating quantities).
        bomTemplateId - The ID of the BOM Template to use as a base.
        Returns:
        An OrderBOMDto populated with details derived from the template, but not yet saved.
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - if either the Sale Order or BOM Template is not found.

      • save

        OrderBOMDto save​(OrderBOMDto dto)
        Saves an Order BOM (either creates a new one or updates an existing one), including its details. This method implements logic to synchronize the detail lines intelligently.
        Parameters:
        dto - The OrderBOMDto object containing the data to save.
        Returns:
        The saved OrderBOMDto object, potentially with updated IDs or audit fields.
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - if related entities (SaleOrder, BOMTemplate, Fabric, Trim) are not found.

      • saveAndGeneratePOs

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> saveAndGeneratePOs​(OrderBOMDto bomDtoFromForm)
        Saves the Order BOM and then automatically generates Purchase Orders (POs) based on the calculated purchase quantities for items not already included in a PO.
        Parameters:
        bomDtoFromForm - The OrderBOMDto submitted from the form, containing potential purchase quantities.
        Returns:
        A map containing a success message or potentially other result information.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if no valid new items are found to generate POs.
        ResourceNotFoundException - if related entities cannot be found during PO creation.
